app.name: BigCommerce
app.short_description: Displays customer and order details from BigCommerce.
app.long_description:
The Zendesk Support for BigCommerce integration works to unite your business by displaying critical BigCommerce data alongside Zendesk Support ticket information.

### Improve customer satisfaction with better conversations

* Solve tickets faster by having access to relevant customer data from BigCommerce, such as billing, shipping and order information, on Zendesk Support ticket pages.
* Easily navigate to additional data in BigCommerce by simply clicking on customer numbers or order numbers in Zendesk Support.

By enabling this app, you agree to the [Built by Zendesk Terms of Use](https://www.zendesk.com/company/built-by-zendesk-agmt/).
app.installation_instructions: For installation instructions, see the article [Installing the BigCommerce for Zendesk Support app](https://support.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/203660086).
